title: [1.2.5][SSP]左轮枪mod 清晰翻译版
author: sylqiuyifeng
txt_content:
本帖最后由 sylqiuyifeng 于 2012-6-6 19:31 编辑 

his mod adds a revolver to the game. In order to keep it from being overpowered, the revolver will need to be crafted from multiple pieces. It shoots gold bullets that will deal 10 hearts of damage to mobs and deal 5 hearts of damage to players. It also shoots iron bullets that deal 4 hearts of damage to mobs and 2 hearts of damage to players. The revolver has the strength of a stone sword when used on mobs. It takes 1% damage with every shot, 5% when used to hit mobs, and 20% when used to break blocks. When shot, the revolver will push you back and make you look farther in the air with recoil. You can repair the revolver by crafting it, 2 iron, 1 redstone, and 1 obsidian in any order. Three special bullets are available. Destruction - Destroys blocks on contact, does extra damage. Teleportation - Transports you to where the bullet hits, does minimal damage. Fire - Turns the block it hits into fire, does normal damage and lights the mob on fire.这个mod增加了左轮，为了保持游戏的可玩性，左轮须要几个组件合成。金子弹能对生物造成10颗心的伤害，对玩家减半。它也能发射铁子弹，对生物造4颗心的伤害，对玩家减半。打击生物有石剑的威力。发射1颗子弹会消耗1百分比的耐久，5个百分比当打击生物的时候，20个百分比当挖掘方块的时候。射击时会产生后坐力把你推后。你可以修复左轮透过合成，2铁，1红石和1黑曜石用任意方式摆放就可以了。这mod有3种不同的子弹，分别为：杀伤弹（蛋疼翻译）（破坏接触的方块，和造成更大的伤害），传送弹（传送到射击的地方），火焰弹（把方块转换成火焰，对生物造成伤害的同时点燃）

Easy Mode
Many people have been saying that this mod is very expensive. This was intentional because we wanted to keep the mod from being over-powered. If too easy to make, you could just run around your world shooting everything in sight. However an easy mode has been added. Easy mode replaces the old recipe, which required several different parts, with a new one that can be made in one simple step. It increases the bullet crafting amount to 12 and the max stack size to 48. The revolver durability is increased to 1000. Special bullets can now be crafted in sets of 3.
容易模式很多人说这东西很昂贵，这是因为我们想保持游戏的平衡性。如果搞得太便宜，你可以周围跑然后射击你看到的所有东西。不过我们加入了容易模式，比较便宜的合成，再也不用分开部件了。子弹的合成增加到了12，叠加上限增加到了48.耐久度增加到了1000，特殊子弹合成增加到3.下载地址

正常版http://115.com/file/be9xful6#Revolver.zip
简单版http://115.com/file/be9xfuy4#Revolver-Easy.zip
简单版合成

枪
金弹
铁弹
火焰弹
传送弹
破坏弹


正常版合成

枪修复合成
枪管
转轮
撞针
扳机
干……不知道这叫啥，机械装置好了
枪把
铁弹
金弹
杀伤弹
传送弹火焰弹

安装方法：
把mod文件放到minecraft.jar里面
声音文件放到那个叫啥？resources
